QuestData.Title: Deemed Worthy
QuestData.Description: You have succeeded where many have failed, sister. Whether it be by strength and courage or mere luck remains to be seen.$b$bGo back to the village and seek out Astrid Bjornrittar. Tell her of your accomplishments. But be warned. She is not easily impressed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Brijana wants you to go to Brunnhildar Village and speak with Astrid Bjornrittar.
QuestData.RewardText: So, sister, you think that completing a few simple chores makes you a heroine?$b$bYou shall learn....
